author: markt
msg: Add error flag to allow subsequent attempts at reading after an error to fail fast
This is the fix for CVE-2014-0227

author: markt
msg: Correct a location where an exception was still thrown directly rather than via the utility method where the error flag is also set.

msg: o Added a test that we can read an Entry with some attributeType containing underscores
o Added a test that checks we can't injected an AttributeType with underscore in the name

author: markt
msg: Remove unnecessary call since doRead() calls checkError()

author: markt
msg: Swap the order of the checks since the filter can't be an the error state once the request has been read.
